title: Contributing
text: find bug, question use feature sufficient documentation, suggestion improvement, please leave issue GitHub repo. bug reports please include: Package version Operating system R version Steps recreate Expected behaviour Actual behaviour

title: Contributing
text: use Git project. means use main, dev, feat/*, bug/*, hotfix/* branches. Please refer post information type branch. main: branch always stores last “production” release software, protected branch. pull request submitted main unless dev, meaning software version updated. dev: pull requests users made dev branch. branch protected deletion. feat: new significantly enhanced features made feat branches merged dev. feat/* branch merged dev, can deleted. bug: branches fix bugs, usually raised issue. bug/* branch merged dev, can deleted. hotfix: difference bug/* hotfix/* branch hotfix small quick fixes (misspellings, incorrect arguments, etc.) short-lived. merged dev, can deleted. periodically merge dev master small release updates. releases appear GitHub releases page.

title: Contributing
text: use GitHub Actions continuous integration platform run workflows. workflows use r-lib/actions R packages. run three types workflows. R CMD check runs push [main, feat/*, hotfix/*, bug/*, dev] branches. Test coverage runs pull requests [main, dev] uses codecov.io integration checking test coverage. Finally, pkgdown runs pushes main, occur dev merged main periodically. Please note sometimes hard diagnose bugs can due date workflows. find strange unusual bug pushing branch, one thing consider checking.

title: Contributing

title: Contributing
text: Pull requests collaborators never submitted directly main, always dev. Periodically create versioned release merge dev main.

title: Make d. suzukii life history parameters — make_lifecycle_parameters
text: c_beta max daily fecundity mu_beta optimal temperature fecundity sigma_beta temperature tolerance fecundity c_E min duration egg stage c_L min duration larvae stage c_P min duration pupae stage mu_E optimal temperature egg stage mu_L optimal temperature larvae stage mu_P optimal temperature pupae stage sigma_E temperature tolerance egg stage sigma_L temperature tolerance larvae stage sigma_P temperature tolerance pupae stage k_E number egg substages k_L number larvae substages k_P number pupae substages c_A max duration adult stage mu_A optimal temperature adult stage sigma_A temperature tolerance adult stage k_A number adult substages (used) c_delta min juvenile mortality mu_delta optimal temperature juvenile mortality sigma_delta temperature tolerance juvenile mortality

what: Make stoichiometry Matrix For a Petri Net — spn_S
title: Make stoichiometry Matrix For a Petri Net — spn_S
text: Generate stoichiometry (|u| |v|) matrix SPN. column gives net effect transition firing upon state space model. Internally, creates Pre (spn_Pre) Post (spn_Post) matrix, calculates final stoichiometry.
